tv_list.description: Text file with one date per line. Each date must be either YYYYMMDD (e.g. 20210415) or YYYYDOY (e.g. 2021105). The number of dates must equal the number of image files.

image_file_list.description: Text file listing full paths to all input raster images (one per line).

quality_file_list.description: Optional: text file listing full paths to QA rasters (one per line, same length as images). Leave empty string if not used.

lc_file.description: Optional: land cover GeoTIFF to apply class-specific parameters. Values in the raster should match 'landuse' IDs defined under class blocks. Leave empty string if not used.

outputfolder.description: Directory where TIMESAT results will be saved. Subfolders 'ST/' (smoothed time series) and 'VPP/' (phenology parameters) will be created inside.

imwindow.description: Sub-window to process: [x_offset, y_offset, width, height]. Use [0,0,0,0] for the full image.

p_band_id.description: Band index (1-based) to process from each input image.

p_ignoreday.description: Day number to ignore in leap years (default: 366 to ignore Dec 31, offseason in the northern hemisphere).

p_ylu.description: Data range limits [min, max]. Values outside are clipped.

p_a.description: QA weighting rules. Leave empty [] to keep original QA values. Use [qa_value, weight] for exact matches or [min, max, weight] for ranges.

p_st_timestep.description: Output temporal resolution in days. Example: 1 = daily, 8 = 8-day composites.

p_nodata.description: NoData value written to output rasters.

p_davailwin.description: Half-window size of filling baseline if no data found.

p_printflag.description: Verbose print flag for TIMESAT internal processing. 0 = silent, 1 = detailed logging.

max_memory_gb.description: Maximum memory (GB) the program should use. Determines block size.

para_check.description: Number of CPU cores to use. If >1, Ray parallel processing is enabled.

ray_dir.description: Temporary directory for Ray (only used if para_check > 1). Must be writable.

scale.description: Optional scaling factor applied to image values before processing. 0 = disabled.

offset.description: Optional offset added after scaling. 0 = disabled.

p_hrvppformat.description: Output format. 1 = YYYYDOY (HRVPP convention). 0 = TIMESAT sequential numbering.

p_nclasses.description: Number of land cover classes defined below (class1, class2, ...).

landuse.description: Land cover ID for this class (must match values in lc_file).

p_fitmethod.description: Fitting method: 1 = double logistic, 2 = smoothing spline.

p_smooth.description: Smoothing parameter for spline. Larger = smoother curves.

p_nenvi.description: Number of upper envelope iterations (1 = none, 2 = one iteration).

p_startmethod.description: Season start detection method (e.g. 1 = amplitude method).

p_startcutoff.description: Cutoff thresholds for season start detection.

p_low_percentile.description: Percentile threshold for baseline level definition.

p_fillbase.description: Fill gaps with baseline flag. 0 = off, 1 = on.

p_seapar.description: Season detection parameter. 1 = single season/year, 2 = allow multiple seasons.
